content.raw:
So far we haven't been testing private member/functions in Gazebo. Using a `friend class` is nice but it would be nice to avoid including the test header file in this class but I haven't found a way to make it properly yet. 

I think in this case here we can add a new public function to get the `configwidget` for the unit tests.
content.html:
So far we haven't been testing private member/functions in Gazebo. Using a friend class is nice but it would be nice to avoid including the test header file in this class but I haven't found a way to make it properly yet.

I think in this case here we can add a new public function to get the configwidget for the unit tests.
